name: Card Game:TriPeaks Solitaire
description:
It's classic you may not know!

A solitaire game with three connected card pyramids. Build regardless of suit counting up or down from the card on top of the pile.
Tri Peaks is a solitaire card game that is akin to the solitaire games Golf and Black Hole. The tri peaks uses one deck and the object is to
clear three peaks made up of cards.
